title: 6 Legged Mars Rover
shortDesc: Bluetooth-controlled hexapod robot powered by Arduino.
description: A 6-legged Mars rover prototype controlled remotely via Bluetooth and powered by Arduino. A complex mechanical build demonstrating advanced locomotion control.

title: Alexa on Raspberry Pi
shortDesc: Custom Alexa voice assistant integration on RPi.
description: Bringing Amazon Alexa to the Raspberry Pi for a custom smart home voice assistant experience.

title: Gesture Control Drone
description: A flying robot (UAV) remotely controlled by hand gestures. Working in conjunction with onboard sensors and GPS for stability and navigation.

title: Mud Skipper Bio-Robot
shortDesc: Biological robot mimicking a mud skipper.
description: A bio-inspired robot that mimics the first land-walking animal. This robot demonstrates the importance of fins and tails for the movement of these amphibious creatures.

title: IoT IR Thermometer
shortDesc: Contactless temperature sensor with high accuracy.
description: An infrared thermometer with a range of 0-99°C, functioning effectively at a 1-meter distance with only 0.02°C error.
